name: Weaver
description: A craftsman who creates textiles and fabrics on looms; adventurers can purchase hand-woven cloth, commission custom textiles, or learn about traditional weaving techniques.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rhythmic sound of looms working and the scent of wool and cotton being transformed into fabric and the gentle rustle of finished textiles. The air carries the promise of quality craftsmanship and the essential nature of textile production, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of creative weaving and the importance of creating beautiful, durable fabrics for clothing and furnishings.
